mapper.insert:
select SEQ_C_PS.NEXTVAL as ID from DUAL
insert into C_PS(PS_ID, TERM_ID, GP_ID, ASSET_NO, PS_NAME, MODEL_CODE, COMM_MODE_GM, BTL, RATED_EC, PS_TYPE, TEST_DAY, TEST_TIME, AUTO_TEST, LASTTIME_STAMP) values(#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{termId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gpId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{assetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baudrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ratedEc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update C_PS set TERM_ID = #{termId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GP_ID = #{gpId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ASSET_NO = #{assetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PS_NAME = #{psName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_CODE = #{psModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_MODE_GM = #{commMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BTL = #{baudrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATED_EC = #{ratedEc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PS_TYPE = #{psType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_DAY = #{testDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_TIME = #{testTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTO_TEST = #{autoTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTTIME_STAMP = #{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PS_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select PS_ID, TERM_ID, GP_ID, ASSET_NO, PS_NAME, MODEL_CODE, COMM_MODE_GM, BTL, RATED_EC, PS_TYPE, TEST_DAY, TEST_TIME, AUTO_TEST, LASTTIME_STAMP from C_PS order by PS_ID
select count(1) as CNT from C_PS
